items.stem: What is the most common cause of major injuries in the workplace?
items.rationale: Slips, trips, and falls consistently account for the majority of workplace injuries.

items.stem: Which of the following can cause a slip? (Select two)
items.rationale: Wet floors and oil spills reduce friction, causing slips. Cables and boxes cause trips.

items.stem: When should you remove a 'Wet Floor' sign?
options: When the floor is completely dry
items.rationale: Leaving signs out when the floor is dry causes people to ignore them (sign blindness).
